article.class: post-8 page type-page status-publish hentry no-post-thumbnail

ul.li: **Kindergarten registration has been postponed and will be announced when the rescheduled date becomes available.** – Children 5 years old before September 1, may be registered. Please phone Canton Elementary School @ 570-673-5196 for a packet. Registration is by appointment only.

li.p: If you have recently moved into Canton Area School District, and need to enroll students for school, please use the attached link and scroll down for the forms and information needed.
The CASD faculty have webpages available for their students to use during this time away from school.

I thought it was important for me to reach out and share with you the district’s plan moving forward in regards to education. Please understand that we as an administrative team have been continually meeting to look at how we can build a plan of continuity of education for all students in the Canton Area School District. We acknowledge there …

link.script:
if(typeof revslider_showDoubleJqueryError==="undefined"){function revslider_showDoubleJqueryError(sliderID){var err="
";err+="
Oops...";err+="
";err+="You have some jquery.js library include that comes after the Slider Revolution files js inclusion.
";err+="To fix this, you can:
1. Set 'Module General Options' -> 'Advanced' -> 'jQuery & OutPut Filters' -> 'Put JS to Body' to on";err+="
2. Find the double jQuery.js inclusion and remove it";err+="";err+="";jQuery(sliderID).show().html(err);}}
